doc:
Justin Kirk https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justin_Kirk 0 Justin Kirk (born May 28, 1969) is an American actor, known for portraying Prior Walter in Mike Nichols's screen adaptation of Angels in America, for which he was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Miniseries or a Movie. He is also known for his portrayal of Andy Botwin on the Showtime series Weeds. Justin_Kirk ( born May_28_,_1969 ) is an_American_actor , known for portraying Prior_Walter in Mike_Nichols 's_screen_adaptation of Angels in America , for which he was_nominated for the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Miniseries or a_Movie . He is_also_known for his_portrayal of Andy_Botwin on the_Showtime_series_Weeds .
